thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: S_Isaacs

author: S_Isaacs
title: S_Isaacs
text: Most excellent ... I highly recommend this company. The customer service is top notch and the product is perfect. I replaced my Dell Inspiron Ultrabook's damaged screen ... it was my first time doing anything like this regarding computers. I called ScreenCountry's customer service and the gentleman was extremely helpful and made sure that I was ordering the correct make of the replacement screen. I was surprised at the prompt delivery. Thank you ScreenCountry.
